INPS and INAIL Practices

Complete solutions for all INPS and INAIL practices

Home > Services > INPS and INAIL Practices

Administrative practice agencies in Milan, including Acentro Services, offer various services related to INPS and INAIL. Acentro Services provides support for managing formalities and compliance with public administration entities.

Here is a detailed list of services offered for INPS and INAIL:

INPS Practices

Position and Termination Verification Access

Support for verifying contribution positions and terminations at INPS.

Unified Certification Model Duplicates

Assistance in obtaining duplicates of the Unified Certification (former CUD).

Tax Bills and Payment Notice Verification

Control and verification of tax bills and payment notices issued by INPS.

F24 Form Duplicate for Artisans and Traders

Support in obtaining duplicates of F24 forms for artisans and traders' contributions.

DURC Certificates

Assistance in obtaining the Single Document of Contribution Regularity.

INAIL Practices

Tax Bills and Payment Notice Verification

Control and verification of tax bills and payment notices issued by INAIL.

Regularizations

Support for regularizing contribution positions at INAIL.

Related Digital Services

Acentro Services also offers digital services such as Digital Signature and Certified Email (PEC), which are useful tools for simplifying operational processes related to communication with INPS and INAIL.

DIGIPRAM: The Management Software for Administrative Practices

Additionally, Acentro Services provides DIGIPRAM, a management software designed for administrative practice agencies, which facilitates practice management and offers features such as document management.

Need assistance with your INPS and INAIL practices?

Contact us for a personalized consultation and discover how we can help you simplify your social security and insurance compliance.

Fast and efficient solutions for businesses and professionals since 1986.
